title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.5 - Shearing strength of rivets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.5 - Shearing strength of rivets

State Regulations
(a) The maximum shearing strength of rivets per square inch of cross-sectional area
shall be taken as follows: Pounds

Iron rivets in single shear....... 38,000

Iron rivets in double shear....... 76,000

Steel rivets in single shear....... 44,000

Steel rivets in double shear....... 88,000
(b) A higher shearing strength may be used
for rivets when it can be shown by test that the rivet material used is of such
quality as to justify the use of a higher shearing strength. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
922.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
